name: Cold-Motion
description:
Description:
• Guide this little hero through a story filled with sadness, happiness, and lots of mysteries. WASD to move, SPACEBAR to shoot, P to pause. Enjoy!

Instructions:
Move with Arrow Keys / 'W/A/S/D' keys.
Pause the game with 'P' key.
Reset the level with 'R' key.
Perform an action with 'SPACE' key.

Game Dimensions: 640x430

Game Category: Action, Adventure, Education, Other

Movement: Arrow Keys/WASD
Fire / Action: Spacebar Key
Jump: Up Arrow/W
